actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to modify the navigation project for Lynnhaven Inlet Bay, and connecting waters, Virginia.

summary.text: Modifies the navigation project for Lynnhaven Inlet and Bay, Virginia, to authorize the Secretary of the Army to pay the city of Virginia Beach, Virginia, $1,630,000 for remedial work on Long Creek Canal.

titles.title: A bill to modify the navigation project for Lynnhaven Inlet Bay, and connecting waters, Virginia.
